//react-project/src/api.js
import axios from'axios';export const fetchLearnerSessionData=async()=>{try{const response=await api.get('/fetch-learner-session-data/');return response.data;}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching session data:',error);return null;}};export const fetchEducatorSessionData=async()=>{try{const response=await api.get('/fetch-educator-session-data/');return response.data;}catch(error){console.error('Error fetching session data:',error);return null;}};const api=axios.create({baseURL:'http://127.0.0.1:8000/api',timeout:2*60*1000,withCredentials:true});api.interceptors.request.use(config=>{return config;},error=>{return Promise.reject(error);});api.interceptors.response.use(response=>{return response;},error=>{if(error.response){console.error("API Error: ".concat(error.response.status," - ").concat(error.response.data));}else if(error.request){console.error('API Error: No response received');}else{console.error("API Error: ".concat(error.message));}return Promise.reject(error);});export default api;
